property.name: bibQuery
property.value: SELECT BIB_MFHD.BIB_ID FROM LMLDB.BIB_MFHD, LMLDB.BIB_MASTER, LMLDB.MFHD_MASTER, LMLDB.BIB_INDEX WHERE BIB_MFHD.MFHD_ID = MFHD_MASTER.MFHD_ID AND BIB_MFHD.BIB_ID = BIB_MASTER.BIB_ID AND BIB_MASTER.SUPPRESS_IN_OPAC != 'Y' AND BIB_MFHD.BIB_ID = BIB_INDEX.BIB_ID and INDEX_CODE = '655H' AND NORMAL_HEADING = 'HISTORICAL WORK' UNION SELECT BIB_MFHD.BIB_ID FROM LMLDB.BIB_MFHD, LMLDB.BIB_MASTER, LMLDB.MFHD_MASTER, LMLDB.BIB_INDEX WHERE BIB_MFHD.MFHD_ID = MFHD_MASTER.MFHD_ID AND BIB_MFHD.BIB_ID = BIB_MASTER.BIB_ID AND BIB_MASTER.SUPPRESS_IN_OPAC != 'Y' AND BIB_MFHD.BIB_ID = BIB_INDEX.BIB_ID and INDEX_CODE = '655H' AND NORMAL_HEADING = 'CLASSICAL WORK' UNION SELECT BIB_MFHD.BIB_ID FROM LMLDB.BIB_MFHD, LMLDB.BIB_MASTER, LMLDB.MFHD_MASTER, LMLDB.BIB_INDEX WHERE BIB_MFHD.MFHD_ID = MFHD_MASTER.MFHD_ID AND BIB_MFHD.BIB_ID = BIB_MASTER.BIB_ID AND BIB_MASTER.SUPPRESS_IN_OPAC != 'Y' AND BIB_MFHD.BIB_ID = BIB_INDEX.BIB_ID and INDEX_CODE = '655H' AND NORMAL_HEADING = 'RARE MATERIAL' UNION SELECT BIB_MFHD.BIB_ID FROM LMLDB.BIB_MFHD, LMLDB.BIB_MASTER, LMLDB.MFHD_MASTER, LMLDB.BIB_INDEX WHERE BIB_MFHD.MFHD_ID = MFHD_MASTER.MFHD_ID AND BIB_MFHD.BIB_ID = BIB_MASTER.BIB_ID AND BIB_MASTER.SUPPRESS_IN_OPAC != 'Y' AND BIB_MFHD.BIB_ID = BIB_INDEX.BIB_ID and INDEX_CODE = '655H' AND NORMAL_HEADING = 'RARE MATERIAL 15TH CENT' UNION SELECT BIB_MFHD.BIB_ID FROM LMLDB.BIB_MFHD, LMLDB.BIB_MASTER, LMLDB.MFHD_MASTER, LMLDB.BIB_INDEX WHERE BIB_MFHD.MFHD_ID = MFHD_MASTER.MFHD_ID AND BIB_MFHD.BIB_ID = BIB_MASTER.BIB_ID AND BIB_MASTER.SUPPRESS_IN_OPAC != 'Y' AND BIB_MFHD.BIB_ID = BIB_INDEX.BIB_ID and INDEX_CODE = '655H' AND NORMAL_HEADING = 'RARE MATERIAL 16TH CENT' UNION SELECT BIB_MFHD.BIB_ID FROM LMLDB.BIB_MFHD, LMLDB.BIB_MASTER, LMLDB.MFHD_MASTER, LMLDB.BIB_INDEX WHERE BIB_MFHD.MFHD_ID = MFHD_MASTER.MFHD_ID AND BIB_MFHD.BIB_ID = BIB_MASTER.BIB_ID AND BIB_MASTER.SUPPRESS_IN_OPAC != 'Y' AND BIB_MFHD.BIB_ID = BIB_INDEX.BIB_ID and INDEX_CODE = '655H' AND NORMAL_HEADING = 'RARE MATERIAL 17TH CENT' UNION SELECT BIB_MFHD.BIB_ID FROM LMLDB.BIB_MFHD, LMLDB.BIB_MASTER, LMLDB.MFHD_MASTER, LMLDB.BIB_INDEX WHERE BIB_MFHD.MFHD_ID = MFHD_MASTER.MFHD_ID AND BIB_MFHD.BIB_ID = BIB_MASTER.BIB_ID AND BIB_MASTER.SUPPRESS_IN_OPAC != 'Y' AND BIB_MFHD.BIB_ID = BIB_INDEX.BIB_ID and INDEX_CODE = '655H' AND NORMAL_HEADING = 'RARE MATERIAL 18TH CENT' UNION SELECT BIB_MFHD.BIB_ID FROM LMLDB.BIB_MFHD, LMLDB.BIB_MASTER, LMLDB.MFHD_MASTER, LMLDB.BIB_INDEX WHERE BIB_MFHD.MFHD_ID = MFHD_MASTER.MFHD_ID AND BIB_MFHD.BIB_ID = BIB_MASTER.BIB_ID AND BIB_MASTER.SUPPRESS_IN_OPAC != 'Y' AND BIB_MFHD.BIB_ID = BIB_INDEX.BIB_ID and INDEX_CODE = '655H' AND NORMAL_HEADING = 'RARE MATERIAL 19TH CENT' UNION SELECT BIB_MFHD.BIB_ID FROM LMLDB.BIB_MFHD, BIB_INDEX.BIB_ID and INDEX_CODE = '655H' AND NORMAL_HEADING = 'RARE MATERIAL 20TH CENT' UNION SELECT BIB_MFHD.BIB_ID FROM LMLDB.BIB_MFHD, LMLDB.BIB_MASTER, LMLDB.MFHD_MASTER, LMLDB.BIB_INDEX WHERE FROM LMLDB.BIB_MFHD, LMLDB.BIB_MASTER, LMLDB.MFHD_MASTER, LMLDB.BIB_INDEX WHERE BIB_MFHD.MFHD_ID = MFHD_MASTER.MFHD_ID AND BIB_MFHD.BIB_ID = BIB_MASTER.BIB_ID AND BIB_MASTER.SUPPRESS_IN_OPAC != 'Y' LMLDB.BIB_INDEX WHERE BIB_MFHD.MFHD_ID = MFHD_MASTER.MFHD_ID AND BIB_MFHD.BIB_ID = BIB_MASTER.BIB_ID AND BIB_MASTER.SUPPRESS_IN_OPAC != 'Y' AND BIB_MFHD.BIB_ID = BIB_INDEX.BIB_ID and INDEX_CODE = '655H' AND NORMAL_HEADING = 'BIOGRAPHY COLLECTIVE' UNION SELECT BIB_MFHD.BIB_ID FROM LMLDB.BIB_MFHD, LMLDB.BIB_MASTER, LMLDB.MFHD_MASTER, LMLDB.BIB_INDEX WHERE BIB_MFHD.MFHD_ID = MFHD_MASTER.MFHD_ID AND BIB_MFHD.BIB_ID = BIB_MASTER.BIB_ID AND BIB_MASTER.SUPPRESS_IN_OPAC != 'Y' AND BIB_MFHD.BIB_ID = BIB_INDEX.BIB_ID and INDEX_CODE = '655H' AND NORMAL_HEADING = 'PORTRAIT' UNION SELECT BIB_MFHD.BIB_ID FROM LMLDB.BIB_MFHD, LMLDB.BIB_MASTER, LMLDB.MFHD_MASTER, LMLDB.BIB_INDEX WHERE BIB_MFHD.MFHD_ID = MFHD_MASTER.MFHD_ID AND BIB_MFHD.BIB_ID = BIB_MASTER.BIB_ID AND BIB_MASTER.SUPPRESS_IN_OPAC != 'Y' AND BIB_MFHD.BIB_ID = BIB_INDEX.BIB_ID and INDEX_CODE = '655H' AND NORMAL_HEADING = 'PORTRAIT GROUP' UNION SELECT BIB_MFHD.BIB_ID FROM LMLDB.BIB_MFHD, BIB_MASTER.BIB_ID AND BIB_MASTER.SUPPRESS_IN_OPAC != 'Y' AND BIB_MFHD.BIB_ID = BIB_INDEX.BIB_ID and INDEX_CODE = '655H' AND NORMAL_HEADING = 'INCUNABLULUM' UNION SELECT BIB_MFHD.BIB_ID FROM LMLDB.BIB_MFHD, LMLDB.BIB_MASTER, LMLDB.MFHD_MASTER, LMLDB.BIB_INDEX WHERE BIB_MFHD.MFHD_ID = MFHD_MASTER.MFHD_ID AND BIB_MFHD.BIB_ID = BIB_MASTER.BIB_ID AND BIB_MASTER.SUPPRESS_IN_OPAC != 'Y' AND BIB_MFHD.BIB_ID = BIB_INDEX.BIB_ID and INDEX_CODE = '655H' AND NORMAL_HEADING = 'MANUSCRIPT HANDWRITTEN' UNION SELECT BIB_MFHD.BIB_ID FROM LMLDB.BIB_MFHD, LMLDB.BIB_MASTER, LMLDB.MFHD_MASTER, LMLDB.BIB_INDEX, LMLDB.BIB_TEXT WHERE BIB_MFHD.MFHD_ID = MFHD_MASTER.MFHD_ID AND BIB_MFHD.BIB_ID = BIB_MASTER.BIB_ID AND BIB_MFHD.BIB_ID = BIB_TEXT.BIB_ID AND BIB_MASTER.SUPPRESS_IN_OPAC != 'Y' AND (BIB_TEXT.END_PUB_DATE IS NULL OR TRANSLATE(BIB_TEXT.END_PUB_DATE,'u#y| ','99999') < '1946') AND BIB_TEXT.BEGIN_PUB_DATE IS NOT NULL AND TRANSLATE(BIB_TEXT.BEGIN_PUB_DATE,'u#y| ','9999') < '1946' AND BIB_MFHD.BIB_ID = BIB_INDEX.BIB_ID and INDEX_CODE = '655H' AND NORMAL_HEADING = 'OBITUARY' UNION SELECT BIB_MFHD.BIB_ID FROM LMLDB.BIB_MFHD, LMLDB.BIB_MASTER, LMLDB.MFHD_MASTER, LMLDB.BIB_INDEX, BIB_MFHD.BIB_ID = BIB_INDEX.BIB_ID and INDEX_CODE = '655H' AND NORMAL_HEADING = 'FESTSCHRIFT' UNION SELECT BIB_MFHD.BIB_ID FROM LMLDB.BIB_MFHD, LMLDB.BIB_MASTER, LMLDB.MFHD_MASTER, LMLDB.BIB_INDEX,
